derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Latin iris, irid- 'rainbow' + -escent

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌曲名：iridescent 歌手：Linkin Park 专辑：A Thousand suns 发行时间：2010-9-14 歌曲简介 Iridescent（彩虹）是林肯公园第4部专辑《A Thousand suns》中的12首歌，2011年4月被定为电影《变形金刚3》的主题曲，并将重新拍摄MV。 在林肯公园的官方网站上，乐队发表了一份声明，该声明中写道：“《Iridescent》这首歌曲在我们的现场表演中是观众最喜欢的歌曲之一，所以我们很高兴导演Michael Bay能够使用我们的这首歌曲

entry.tran: 彩虹色的;颜色闪耀的;色彩斑斓的
entry.def: Something that is iridescent has many bright colours that seem to keep changing.

means.word_mean: 1. varying in color when seen in different lights or from different angles;
2. having a play of lustrous rainbow-like colors;

auth_sentence.content: The brook...broke into innumerable iridescent cascades as it fell.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The brook...broke into innumerable iridescent cascades as it fell.

auth_sentence.content: The best fictions, without a deep moral significance beneath, are only iridescent froth.
